app.description: Helps you track time spent on tickets.
app.name: Time Tracking

time_field_id.label: Time Field ID
time_field_id.helpText: The ID of a custom numeric field that will hold the total time.

time_object_field_id.label: Configuration Field ID
time_object_field_id.helpText: The ID of a custom numeric field that will hold the time spent on ticket.

display_timelogs.label: Display timelogs to agents
display_timelogs.helpText: Agents can see timelog activity on tickets.

hide_from_agents.label: Hide the app from agents
hide_from_agents.helpText: The app will not be shown to agents who do not have the 'Admin' role. This also prevents them from being able to see & edit the time upon submission.

manual_pause_resume.label: Display timer controls
manual_pause_resume.helpText: Agents can manually pause or reset the timer.

auto_pause_resume.label: Auto pause
auto_pause_resume.helpText: The timer pauses when the agent navigates away from the ticket and resumes when the agent is back on the ticket.

reset.label: Reset current time
reset.helpText: Agents can reset the current time spent on a ticket.

resume_on_changes.label: Resume on changes
resume_on_changes.helpText: The timer resumes automatically when the agent makes changes to any fields.

time_submission.label: Edit time submission
time_submission.helpText: Agents can review and edit their time before submitting the ticket.

simple_submission.label: Simplified time submission
simple_submission.helpText: Prompt agents to enter a value in minutes before submitting the ticket

timelogs.title: Timelogs
timelogs.error: We are unable to load any timelogs.

modal.body: This is the amount of time you spent on this ticket. Edit the time, if you need to, then click "Submit time".

resume_modal.body: Would you like to resume the timer?
